item.title: Christine Enright
item.description: Welcome to How Bout Them Apples, where every apple is crafted with love and a touch of family tradition. Since 2003, I’ve been creating delectable caramel and chocolate-covered apples, starting as a simple gesture of love for my family during Christmas. Little did I know that this sweet endeavor would blossom into a cherished business, thanks to the overwhelming support and enthusiasm from my sisters, coworkers, and, eventually, a growing circle of delighted customers.
